We refer to Wikipedia articles on news for help. At the time the reporter mentioned that environmental activists were carrying out their own tests outside Japan's crippled nuclear evacuation zone, the video on screen might show two people in white protective suits outside in the snow as one uses an orange device to take readings.

Therefore, the answer is (B).
Option B: A close-up of a damaged nuclear facility overlaid with "Crisis at Fukushima" and "Radiation measured at 10 times normal."
